name: Coin Hunt
description:
Coin hunt is a hard simple 2D platform game where you try to complete 9 well designed levels with collecting or non collecting coins. Make sure to check my socials.

Tik Tok & YouTube

If you play the game pls comment down below. And I\m now making a 2D horror game so if you are interested and skilled in music or art you can help me. Just contact me on the links above.
